title: Berkshire’s Investment Changes, Vi’s AI Personal Trainer, Alternatives as an Option
itunes:title: Berkshire’s Investment Changes, Vi’s AI Personal Trainer, Alternatives as an Option
description:
Noah Buhayar, Bloomberg News Finance Reporter, explains Warren Buffet’s investment strategies. Omri Yoffe, CEO at Lifebeam, discusses his artificial intelligence personal training device called Vi. Cleo Chang, Head of Alternative Investments at American Century, explains why she favors investing in alts when the markets are volatile. Elena Popina, Bloomberg News Equity Markets Reporter, says the tech sector has taken back its dominant leadership position in the markets. We Drive to the Close with Michael Cuggino, President at Permanent Portfolio Family Funds. Carol and Cory hit today’s “Movers and Shakers” and Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson has his “Stock of the Day.” 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
